ðŸ“– Summary: GOverlay is a graphical user interface designed to simplify the management of Vulkan and OpenGL overlays on Linux. It provides a user-friendly way to configure popular overlay tools like MangoHud and vkBasalt, as well as offering features such as cloning the reshade repository and displaying AMD CPU power information. The project aims to provide a comprehensive solution for users who want to customize and control their gaming or application overlays.
